data.caption: Financial Results For Third Quarter And Nine Months Ended On 31St December 2022
data.news_body:
In continuation to our intimation dated February 3, 2023 and in terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 [Listing Regulations], we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on February 13, 2023, has approved the following items:

1. Unaudited Financial Results
In terms of Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations,
a. Unaudited financial results for the third quarter ended on December 31, 2022;
b. Limited Review Report from the Auditors for the third quarter ended on December 31, 2022;

A copy of the unaudited financial results along with the limited review report is enclosed.

You are requested to kindly take the same on your records.

data.news_body:

data.caption: Financial Results For The Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on May 26, 2022, approved the Audited Financial Results for the year ended March 31, 2022, along with the Auditors' Report thereon.

Further, in terms of provisions Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith the copy of
- Financial Results for the 4th quarter and year ended on March 31, 2022;
- Auditors Report on the Audited Financial Results for the year ended on March 31, 2022;

We also hereby declare that the Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants (Registration No. 117365W), have issued the Audit Report with Unmodified Opinion in respect of Annual Audited Financial Results for the year ended on March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On May 26, 2022
data.news_body:
The BOD of the Company, at its meeting held today, has approved:
1. The BOD of the Company has considered and declared 2nd Interim Dividend of Rs. 105/- (i.e. 1050%) per equity share of Rs. 10 each for the FY 2021-22. The record date for the purpose is fixed as Tuesday, June 7, 2022.
2. The BOD approved the Audited Financial Results for the year ended March 31, 2022, along with the Auditors' Report thereon and also approved the financial results In terms of provisions Reg 33 of the Listing Regulations with Auditors Report thereon;
The Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants (Regi No. 117365W), have issued the Audit Report with Unmodified Opinion in respect of Annual Audited Financial Results for the year ended on March 31, 2022.
3. The Board has NOT recommended any final Dividend for FY ended on March 31, 2022 and the Interim Dividends declared during the year, have been confirmed as the 'final dividend' for the year 2021-22.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please be informed that the following interactions have been scheduled to be held, during this week between the Company and its institutional investors/ analysts: Date: 23-03-2022 - 25-03-2022 Type of meeting: Conference calls Interaction with: Group of investors  Venue: VirtualNote: Above meeting schedules are subject to change. Changes may happen due to exigencies, logistical disorders, and last-minute schedule conflicts on the part of investors and/or the Company. The schedule of investor / analyst meets is also being placed on the Company's website in accordance with the Regulations.In this regard, please find attached the Investor Presentation for the aforesaid Investor Calls, which is also being uploaded on the Company's website. This is for your records and further dissemination.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On February 09, 2022
data.news_body:
In continuation to our intimation dated January 28, 2022 and in terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 [Listing Regulations], we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held through video conferencing today i.e. on February 09, 2022, has approved the following items:
1. Unaudited financial results for the third quarter ended on December 31, 2021 and Limited Review Report form the Auditors for the third quarter ended on December 31, 2021;
2. Re-appointment of Mr. Sanjiv Vasudeva as Managing Director & CEO of the Company.
The Board meeting commenced at 13.14 hours (IST) and concluded at 13.45 hours (IST).

institutional investors. The schedule of investor / analyst meets, once finalized, will be placed on
the Company's website in accordance with the Regulations.
In this regard, please find attached the Investor Presentation for the aforesaid Investor Calls,
which is also being uploaded on the Company's website,
This is for your records and further dissemination.
